positions.title: Information Systems
positions.description: As an Information Systems Intern, I worked closely with IS and Marketing leadership on several projects. I designed, developed, and deployed a registration website for the 2025 shareholder convention. I improved maintenance workflow efficiency and visibility by researching and implementing MS Power Apps in collaboration with Maintenance leadership. I collaborated with IS coworkers to execute an org-wide initiative to port user machine backups from an on-premises storage server to the cloud. I wrote and presented an assessment of generative AI tools to the executive team, highlighting their key strengths and weaknesses.
